Uses of Class
wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor.FilterEditor

  • Packages that use FilterEditor 
    Package Description
    wissim.controller.filters.gui  

    • Uses of FilterEditor in wissim.controller.filters.gui

      Methods in wissim.controller.filters.gui that return FilterEditor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FilterEditor FiltersHandler.getEditor(int column)
      Returns the FilterEditor instance on the given column.
      Methods in wissim.controller.filters.gui that return types with arguments of type FilterEditor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<FilterEditor> FiltersHandler.getEditors()
      Returns all registered FilterEditors.
      Methods in wissim.controller.filters.gui with parameters of type FilterEditor 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void FiltersHandler.addFilterEditor(FilterEditor editor)
      Adds a new filter editor, called from the TableFilterHeader.
      void FiltersHandler.removeFilterEditor(FilterEditor editor)
      Removes a filter editor, called from the TableFilterHeader.
      void FiltersHandler.updateEditorChoices(FilterEditor editor)
      Method invoked by the FilterEditor when its autoChoices mode OR user choices change; in return, it will set the proper choices on the specified editor.
